summary.para: The HTTP_REQUEST_AUTH_TYPE enumeration defines the authentication types supported by the HTTP Server API.
This enumeration is used in the structure.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_AUTH_TYPE.HttpRequestAuthTypeNone
member.summary: No authentication is attempted for the request.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_AUTH_TYPE.HttpRequestAuthTypeBasic
member.summary: Basic authentication is attempted for the request.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_AUTH_TYPE.HttpRequestAuthTypeDigest
member.summary: Digest authentication is attempted for the request.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_AUTH_TYPE.HttpRequestAuthTypeNTLM
member.summary: NTLM authentication is attempted for the request.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_AUTH_TYPE.HttpRequestAuthTypeNegotiate
member.summary: Negotiate authentication is attempted for the request.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_AUTH_TYPE.HttpRequestAuthTypeKerberos
member.summary: Kerberos authentication is attempted for the request.
